entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 2.0°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border early in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 late in the morning then becoming west 70 gusting to 100. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the evening. Snow level 2200 metres lowering to valley bottom in the evening. Wind west 70 km/h gusting to 100 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 near midnight then light after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
